description: Abbreviated code identifying the vehicleâ€™s transmission, typically indicating gear count, manufacturer/series, or shift type; used as the concise transmission identifier.
Human-readable description of the transmission corresponding to the code, detailing speeds, manufacturer/series, and configuration or shift type; intended for display and reporting.
Boolean flag indicating whether this transmission option is no longer current and should not be assigned to new assets; retained for historical or legacy records.
Surrogate numeric identifier for the transmission record; primary key used to join to vehicles or other tables.
